snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a look at the first original series from Netflix, how social media services are handling posts about the Gaza...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a look at the first original series from Netflix, how social media services are handling posts about the Gaza conflict and a report of thousands of iPad minis stolen from a New York airport.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Musicians' Pennies and Funds' Facebook Shares
